name: Yusuf Ali
text: Closer and closer to mankind comes their Reckoning: yet they heed not and they turn away.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Never comes (aught) to them of a renewed Message from their Lord, but they listen to it as in jest,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Their hearts toying as with trifles. The wrong-doers conceal their private counsels, (saying), "Is this (one) more than a man like yourselves? Will ye go to witchcraft with your eyes open?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Say: "My Lord knoweth (every) word (spoken) in the heavens and on earth: He is the One that heareth and knoweth (all things)."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Nay," they say, "(these are) medleys of dream! - Nay, He forged it! - Nay, He is (but) a poet! Let him then bring us a Sign like the ones that were sent to (Prophets) of old!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (As to those) before them, not one of the populations which We destroyed believed: will these believe?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Before thee, also, the messengers We sent were but men, to whom We granted inspiration: If ye realise this not, ask of those who possess the Message.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Nor did We give them bodies that ate no food, nor were they exempt from death.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: In the end We fulfilled to them Our Promise, and We saved them and those whom We pleased, but We destroyed those who transgressed beyond bounds.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We have revealed for you (O men!) a book in which is a Message for you: will ye not then understand?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: How many were the populations We utterly destroyed because of their iniquities, setting up in their places other peoples?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Yet, when they felt Our Punishment (coming), behold, they (tried to) flee from it.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Flee not, but return to the good things of this life which were given you, and to your homes in order that ye may be called to account.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "Ah! woe to us! We were indeed wrong-doers!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And that cry of theirs ceased not, till We made them as a field that is mown, as ashes silent and quenched.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Not for (idle) sport did We create the heavens and the earth and all that is between!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: If it had been Our wish to take (just) a pastime, We should surely have taken it from the things nearest to Us, if We would do (such a thing)!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Nay, We hurl the Truth against falsehood, and it knocks out its brain, and behold, falsehood doth perish! Ah! woe be to you for the (false) things ye ascribe (to Us).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: To Him belong all (creatures) in the heavens and on earth: Even those who are in His (very) Presence are not too proud to serve Him, nor are they (ever) weary (of His service):

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They celebrate His praises night and day, nor do they ever flag or intermit.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Or have they taken (for worship) gods from the earth who can raise (the dead)?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: If there were, in the heavens and the earth, other gods besides Allah, there would have been confusion in both! but glory to Allah, the Lord of the Throne: (High is He) above what they attribute to Him!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He cannot be questioned for His acts, but they will be questioned (for theirs).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Or have they taken for worship (other) gods besides him? Say, "Bring your convincing proof: this is the Message of those with me and the Message of those before me." But most of them know not the Truth, and so turn away.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Not a messenger did We send before thee without this inspiration sent by Us to him: that there is no god but I; therefore worship and serve Me.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And they say: "(Allah) Most Gracious has begotten offspring." Glory to Him! they are (but) servants raised to honour.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They speak not before He speaks, and they act (in all things) by His Command.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He knows what is before them, and what is behind them, and they offer no intercession except for those who are acceptable, and they stand in awe and reverence of His (Glory).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: If any of them should say, "I am a god besides Him", such a one We should reward with Hell: thus do We reward those who do wrong.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Do not the Unbelievers see that the heavens and the earth were joined together (as one unit of creation), before we clove them asunder? We made from water every living thing. Will they not then believe?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And We have set on the earth mountains standing firm, lest it should shake with them, and We have made therein broad highways (between mountains) for them to pass through: that they may receive Guidance.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And We have made the heavens as a canopy well guarded: yet do they turn away from the Signs which these things (point to)!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: It is He Who created the Night and the Day, and the sun and the moon: all (the celestial bodies) swim along, each in its rounded course.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We granted not to any man before thee permanent life (here): if then thou shouldst die, would they live permanently?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Every soul shall have a taste of death: and We test you by evil and by good by way of trial. to Us must ye return.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: When the Unbelievers see thee, they treat thee not except with ridicule. "Is this," (they say), "the one who talks of your gods?" and they blaspheme at the mention of (Allah) Most Gracious!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Man is a creature of haste: soon (enough) will I show you My Signs; then ye will not ask Me to hasten them!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They say: "When will this promise come to pass, if ye are telling the truth?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: If only the Unbelievers knew (the time) when they will not be able to ward off the fire from their faces, nor yet from their backs, and (when) no help can reach them!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Nay, it may come to them all of a sudden and confound them: no power will they have then to avert it, nor will they (then) get respite.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Mocked were (many) messenger before thee; But their scoffers were hemmed in by the thing that they mocked.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Say: "Who can keep you safe by night and by day from (the Wrath of) (Allah) Most Gracious?" Yet they turn away from the mention of their Lord.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Or have they gods that can guard them from Us? They have no power to aid themselves, nor can they be defended from Us.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Nay, We gave the good things of this life to these men and their fathers until the period grew long for them; See they not that We gradually reduce the land (in their control) from its outlying borders? Is it then they who will win?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Say, "I do but warn you according to revelation": But the deaf will not hear the call, (even) when they are warned!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: If but a breath of the Wrath of thy Lord do touch them, they will then say, "Woe to us! we did wrong indeed!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We shall set up scales of justice for the Day of Judgment, so that not a soul will be dealt with unjustly in the least, and if there be (no more than) the weight of a mustard seed, We will bring it (to account): and enough are We to take account.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: In the past We granted to Moses and Aaron the criterion (for judgment), and a Light and a Message for those who would do right,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Those who fear their Lord in their most secret thoughts, and who hold the Hour (of Judgment) in awe.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And this is a blessed Message which We have sent down: will ye then reject it?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We bestowed aforetime on Abraham his rectitude of conduct, and well were We acquainted with him.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Behold! he said to his father and his people, "What are these images, to which ye are (so assiduously) devoted?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said, "We found our fathers worshipping them."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said, "Indeed ye have been in manifest error - ye and your fathers."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said, "Have you brought us the Truth, or are you one of those who jest?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said, "Nay, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, He Who created them (from nothing): and I am a witness to this (Truth).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And by Allah, I have a plan for your idols - after ye go away and turn your backs"..

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So he broke them to pieces, (all) but the biggest of them, that they might turn (and address themselves) to it.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said, "Who has done this to our gods? He must indeed be some man of impiety!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said, "We heard a youth talk of them: He is called Abraham."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said, "Then bring him before the eyes of the people, that they may bear witness."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said, "Art thou the one that did this with our gods, O Abraham?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said: "Nay, this was done by - this is their biggest one! ask them, if they can speak intelligently!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So they turned to themselves and said, "Surely ye are the ones in the wrong!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then were they confounded with shame: (they said), "Thou knowest full well that these (idols) do not speak!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Abraham) said, "Do ye then worship, besides Allah, things that can neither be of any good to you nor do you harm?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Fie upon you, and upon the things that ye worship besides Allah! Have ye no sense?"..

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said, "Burn him and protect your gods, If ye do (anything at all)!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We said, "O Fire! be thou cool, and (a means of) safety for Abraham!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then they sought a stratagem against him: but We made them the ones that lost most!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But We delivered him and (his nephew) Lut (and directed them) to the land which We have blessed for the nations.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And We bestowed on him Isaac and, as an additional gift, (a grandson), Jacob, and We made righteous men of every one (of them).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And We made them leaders, guiding (men) by Our Command, and We sent them inspiration to do good deeds, to establish regular prayers, and to practise regular charity; and they constantly served Us (and Us only).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And to Lut, too, We gave Judgment and Knowledge, and We saved him from the town which practised abominations: truly they were a people given to Evil, a rebellious people.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And We admitted him to Our Mercy: for he was one of the Righteous.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Remember) Noah, when he cried (to Us) aforetime: We listened to his (prayer) and delivered him and his family from great distress.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We helped him against people who rejected Our Signs: truly they were a people given to Evil: so We drowned them (in the Flood) all together.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And remember David and Solomon, when they gave judgment in the matter of the field into which the sheep of certain people had strayed by night: We did witness their judgment.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: To Solomon We inspired the (right) understanding of the matter: to each (of them) We gave Judgment and Knowledge; it was Our power that made the hills and the birds celebrate Our praises, with David: it was We Who did (all these things).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: It was We Who taught him the making of coats of mail for your benefit, to guard you from each other's violence: will ye then be grateful?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (It was Our power that made) the violent (unruly) wind flow (tamely) for Solomon, to his order, to the land which We had blessed: for We do know all things.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And of the evil ones, were some who dived for him, and did other work besides; and it was We Who guarded them.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And (remember) Job, when He cried to his Lord, "Truly distress has seized me, but Thou art the Most Merciful of those that are merciful."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So We listened to him: We removed the distress that was on him, and We restored his people to him, and doubled their number,- as a Grace from Ourselves, and a thing for commemoration, for all who serve Us.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And (remember) Isma'il, Idris, and Zul-kifl, all (men) of constancy and patience;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We admitted them to Our mercy: for they were of the righteous ones.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And remember Zun-nun, when he departed in wrath: He imagined that We had no power over him! But he cried through the deptHs of darkness, "There is no god but thou: glory to thee: I was indeed wrong!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So We listened to him: and delivered him from distress: and thus do We deliver those who have faith.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And (remember) Zakariya, when he cried to his Lord: "O my Lord! leave me not without offspring, though thou art the best of inheritors."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So We listened to him: and We granted him Yahya: We cured his wife's (Barrenness) for him. These (three) were ever quick in emulation in good works; they used to call on Us with love and reverence, and humble themselves before Us.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And (remember) her who guarded her chastity: We breathed into her of Our spirit, and We made her and her son a sign for all peoples.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Verily, this brotherhood of yours is a single brotherhood, and I am your Lord and Cherisher: therefore serve Me (and no other).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But (later generations) cut off their affair (of unity), one from another: (yet) will they all return to Us.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Whoever works any act of righteousness and has faith,- His endeavour will not be rejected: We shall record it in his favour.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But there is a ban on any population which We have destroyed: that they shall not return,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Until the Gog and Magog (people) are let through (their barrier), and they swiftly swarm from every hill.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then will the true promise draw nigh (of fulfilment): then behold! the eyes of the Unbelievers will fixedly stare in horror: "Ah! Woe to us! we were indeed heedless of this; nay, we truly did wrong!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Verily ye, (unbelievers), and the (false) gods that ye worship besides Allah, are (but) fuel for Hell! to it will ye (surely) come!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: If these had been gods, they would not have got there! but each one will abide therein.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: There, sobbing will be their lot, nor will they there hear (aught else).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Those for whom the good (record) from Us has gone before, will be removed far therefrom.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Not the slightest sound will they hear of Hell: what their souls desired, in that will they dwell.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: The Great Terror will bring them no grief: but the angels will meet them (with mutual greetings): "This is your Day,- (the Day) that ye were promised."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: The Day that We roll up the heavens like a scroll rolled up for books (completed),- even as We produced the first creation, so shall We produce a new one: a promise We have undertaken: truly shall We fulfil it.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Before this We wrote in the Psalms, after the Message (given to Moses): My servants the righteous, shall inherit the earth."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Verily in this (Qur'an) is a Message for people who would (truly) worship Allah.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We sent thee not, but as a Mercy for all creatures.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Say: "What has come to me by inspiration is that your Allah is One Allah: will ye therefore bow to His Will (in Islam)?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But if they turn back, Say: "I have proclaimed the Message to you all alike and in truth; but I know not whether that which ye are promised is near or far.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "It is He Who knows what is open in speech and what ye hide (in your hearts).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "I know not but that it may be a trial for you, and a grant of (worldly) livelihood (to you) for a time."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Say: "O my Lord! judge Thou in truth!" "Our Lord Most Gracious is the One Whose assistance should be sought against the blasphemies ye utter!"
